##### 4.1

```{r}
new_scores <- c(66, 75, 72, 71, 55, 56, 72, 93, 73, 72, 72, 73, 91, 66, 71, 56, 59)
sort(table(new_scores), decreasing = TRUE)
cat("從上表，我們可以得知 mode 為 72。")
cat("median = ", median(new_scores), ", mean = ", mean(new_scores), sep = "")
```

##### 4.4

```{r}
set.seed(1830)
nums <- sample(0:100, 10, replace = TRUE)
nums <- c(nums, 2000)
cat(nums)
cat("mean = ", mean(nums), ", median = ", median(nums), sep = "")
```

##### 4.5

```{r}
nums <- sample(1:20, 50, replace = TRUE)
nums <- c(nums, sample(21:100, 50, replace = TRUE))
hist(nums, breaks = seq(from = 0, to = 100, by = 1))
cat("mean = ", mean(nums), ", median = ", median(nums), sep = "")
cat("mean 大於 median。")
```

##### 4.8

```{r}
library(purrr)
const <- 5
old_nums <- c(8, 7, 12, 14, 3, 7)
new_nums <- map_dbl(old_nums, ~ . - const)
cat("Original:", old_nums)
cat("mean = ", mean(old_nums), ", median = ", median(old_nums), sep = "")
cat("New:", new_nums)
cat("mean = ", mean(new_nums), ", median = ", median(new_nums), sep = "")
```

##### 4.9

```{r}
old_nums <- c(8, 3, 5, 5, 6, 2)
new_nums <- map_dbl(old_nums, ~ . * const)
cat("Original:", old_nums)
cat("mean = ", mean(old_nums), ", median = ", median(old_nums), sep = "")
cat("New:", new_nums)
cat("mean = ", mean(new_nums), ", median = ", median(new_nums), sep = "")
```
